body:
Comment 1: 
I can confirm this bug, as I discovered it in a different context. (builder code for the
dashboard)

Agreed, your fix is a bandaid. The cgo build scripts should use the same environment as
the rest of the build process. I haven't had a chance to investigate this yet.
_Labels changed: added **cgo**._ _Owner changed to **i...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
